Overload.descr:
[IFbMetadbHandleList]
[1.5.0 Preview 6]: New:

[IMenuObj]
flags: see Flags.txt.

[IMenuObj]
Same as AppendMenuItem(MF_SEPARATOR,...,...)

[IMenuObj]
[1.5.0 Beta 2] New:

[IGdiBitmap]
Changes will be saved in the current bitmap

[IFbMetadbHandleList]
Only works when sorted, faster than Find()

[IMainMenuManager]
NOTE: the last param is count, not max_id, this is different from what IContextMenuManager does.

[IGdiGraphics]
[1.3.5] New: Note that it will only calulate one line text height.

[IGdiGraphics]
Used with GDI functions, such as GdiDrawText().

[IMenuObj]
[1.3.0] Changed: check is now a boolean value. [1.3.2] Changed: Add bypos parameter.

[IMenuObj]
[1.3.2] Changed: Add bypos parameter.

[IFbMetadbHandle]
[1.3.2] New Compare two IFbMetadbHandle instances, pointer only. If you want to compare them physically, use the "RawPath" property, and compare these two values.

[IGdiBitmap]
Create a DDB bitmap from IGdiBitmap, which is used in GdiDrawBitmap()

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Shadow ---- Mode: Soft shadow

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Outline Mode ----

[IGdiGraphics]
[1.3.2] New: points is either a VBArray or JScript array.

[IThemeManager]
[1.3.2] Updated: clip_*: set clipping area.

[IMenuObj]
[1.3.2] Changed: Add bypos parameter.

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Shadow ----

[1.5.0] New: new interface for playback queue [IFbPlaybackQueueItem]
item: an instance of IFbPlaybackQueueItem.

[IGdiGraphics]
[1.3.5] New: Returns a VBArray index | meaning [0] text line 1 [1] width of text line 1 (in pixel) [2] text line 2 [3] width of text line 2 (in pixel) . . . [2n + 2] text line n [2n + 3] width of text line n (in pixel)

[IGdiGraphics]
[1.3.4] Updated: focus: Specify where the center color will be at its highest intensity, from 0.0 to 1.0

[IGdiGraphics]
[1.3,2] New: fillmode: 0 - Alternate, 1 - Winding points is either a VBArray or JScript array.

[PlaylistRecyclerManager]
returns the index

[IGdiGraphics]
Always faster than DrawImage, do not support alpha channel

[IGdiGraphics]
[1.3.0] Updated: Returns a VBArray (also see utils.Glob()): index | meaning [0] left (DT_CALCRECT) [1] top (DT_CALCRECT) [2] right (DT_CALCRECT) [3] bottom (DT_CALCRECT) [4] characters drawn Always faster than DrawString and returns chars drawed

[IFbTooltip]
[1.3.4] New: in milliseconds type: See flags.txt

[IGdiBitmap]
NOTE: Don't forget to use ReleaseGraphics() after operations on IGdiGraphics interface is done.

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Outline Mode ----

[IFbFileInfo]
returns idx

[IMainMenuManager]
NOTE: Only root menu name

[IThemeManager]
NOTE: stateid should be 0, it's unused now.

Must be sorted

[IFbMetadbHandleList]

[IFbMetadbHandleList]
Must be sorted

[IGdiGraphics]
Used with GDI+ functions, such as DrawString().

[IFbFileInfo]
returns idx

[IFbMetadbHandleList]
[1.5.0 Preview 4]: New: titleformatObject: an instance of IFbTitleFormat. direction: integer, ascending while >0.

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Outline Mode ----

[PlaylistRecyclerManager]
Purge multiple content at once. affectedItems is an array contains the indexes.

[IFbMetadbHandleList]
[1.5.0 Preview 6]: New:

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Render ---- Not recommended, if the flags contains something as "center", this won't work properly, because it's lack of width and height information.

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Render ---- Not recommended, if the flags contains something as "center", this won't work properly, because it's lack of width and height information.

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Shadow ---- if you have a *global* IStyleTextRender instance once called EnableShadow(), it's recommended to call ResetShadow() then.

[IGdiBitmap]
[1.5.0 Beta 5]: Changed: Add parameter "interpolationMode". See Flags.txt meanings of modes.

[IFbTooltip]
[1.3.4] New: type: See flags.txt

[IGdiGraphics]
See Flags.txt meanings of modes.

[IThemeManager]
For parts and stats: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb773210%28VS.85%29.aspx You get vsstyle.h and vssym32.h (won't included in Flags because they are too large) here: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2451120/vsstyles_h.7z

[IFbUiSelectionHolder]
Sets selected items to playlist selection and enables tracking. When the playlist selection changes, the stored selection is automatically updated. Tracking ends when a set method is called on any ui_selection_holder or when the last reference to this ui_selection_holder is released.

[IFbUiSelectionHolder]
Sets selected items to the contents of the active playlist and enables tracking. hen the active playlist or its contents changes, the stored selection is automatically updated. Tracking ends when a set method is called on any ui_selection_holder or when the last reference to this ui_selection_holder is released.

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Render ---- [1.3.0] New Only in pngmode, the image should be a transparent image created by gdi.CreateImage().

[IFbUiSelectionHolder]
Sets the selected items. It should not to clear the selection

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Shadow ---- While using DiffusedShadow(), these two methods(another SetShadowBackgroundImage) below are useful

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Shadow ---- While using DiffusedShadow(), these two methods(another SetShadowBackgroundColor) below are useful

[IGdiGraphics]
See Flags.txt meanings of modes.

[IGdiGraphics]
See Flags.txt meanings of modes.

[IStyleTextRender]
---- Shadow ---- Mode: Default shadow, used in solid shadow color

[IDropTargetAction]
Parse dropped items as playlist

[IMenuObj]
[1.4.0 Beta 3] Updated: flags: Control popup positions and animations. (See Flags.txt)

[IFbTooltip]
[1.5.0 Preview 8]: New: NOTE: You should make sure x, y is changed before call, or you will recive a blinking tooltip.

function on_char(code) {}
[1.3.2] New: code: UTF16 encoded char. NOTE: in order to use this callback, set flag DLGC_WANTCHARS (#Flags.txt) to window.DlgCode.

function on_colors_changed() {}
[1.3.0] New: DUI and CUI On color setting changed Retrieve colors using window.GetColorXXX() method.

function on_drag_drop(action, x, y, mask) {}
[1.4.1] Added: x, y and mask have the same meaning as in on_mouse_*() callbacks. action: an object of IDropTargetAction interface.

function on_drag_enter(action, x, y, mask) {}
[1.4.1] Added: x, y and mask have the same meaning as in on_mouse_*() callbacks. action: an object of IDropTargetAction interface.

function on_drag_leave() {}
[1.4.1] Added:

function on_drag_over(action, x, y, mask) {}
[1.4.1] Added: x, y and mask have the same meaning as in on_mouse_*() callbacks. action: an object of IDropTargetAction interface.

function on_focus(is_focused) {}
Get or lost focus

function on_font_changed() {}
[1.3.0] New: DUI and CUI On font setting changed Retrieve fonts using window.GetFontXXX() method.

function on_get_album_art_done(metadb, art_id, image, image_path) {}
[1.1.10] New: [1.3.0] Updated: image_path will point to the image file (or music file itself, if image is an embedded image) Get called while thread created by GetAlbumArtAsync() is done.

function on_item_focus_change(playlist, from, to) {}
[1.1.1] Updated: Called when playlist focus has been changed For those who what to implement "follow cursor" [1.5.0 Preview 6]: Changed: Add callback parameters "playlist", "from" and "to"

function on_item_played(metadb) {}
[1.1.10] New: Called when at least 60s of the track has been played, or the track has reached its end after at least 1/3 of it has been played through.

function on_key_down(vkey) {}
Keyboard key down HINT: Return true to suppress processing keyboard shortcuts vkey: Virtual Key Code, Refer to: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms927178.aspx

function on_key_up(vkey) {}
[1.3.2] New: Keyboard key up vkey: Virtual Key Code, Refer to: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms927178.aspx

function on_metadb_changed(metadb_or_metadbs, fromhook) {}
[1.1.3] New: [1.4.0] Changed: Called when metadb contents change. (Or, one of display hook component requests display update). Cooperated with window.WatchMetadb() and window.UnWatchMetadb() metadb_or_metadbs: prior to "v1.4.0" - The same metadb as in window.WatchMetadb(metadb) "v1.4.0" - Metadb handles fromhook: boolean, set to true when actual file contents haven't changed but one of metadb_display_field_provider implementations requested an update so output of metadb_handle::format_title() etc has changed. NOTE: See Preprocessors.txt if you are using @feature directive. NOTE: metadb will be metadb handle list (already sorted) when preprocessor directive "feature": 1. "v1.4" and later is set; 2. "watch-metadb" is set.

function on_mouse_lbtn_dblclk(x, y, mask) {}
[1.1.8] Added: mask, see Flags.txt for more details

function on_mouse_lbtn_down(x, y, mask) {}
[1.0.4] Updated: mask, see Flags.txt for more details

function on_mouse_leave() {}
Called when mouse leaves WSH Panel Mod

function on_mouse_mbtn_up(x, y, mask) {}
[1.1.8] New: mask, see Flags.txt for more details Actions should be executed in this callback

function on_mouse_move(x, y, mask) {}
[1.4.1] Updated:

function on_mouse_rbtn_up(x, y, mask) {}
[1.0.4] New: mask, see Flags.txt for more details HINT: return true if you want to supress the default context menu. NOTE: {L-Win}+{L-Shift}+{Right Click} is reserved for poping up the default context menu.
function on_mouse_wheel(step) {}

function on_notify_data(name, info) {}
[1.1.1] New: Called in other panels after window.NotifyOthers(name, info) is executed name and info is the same as in NotifyOthers() [1.3.0] Updated, see Interfaces.txt for more details.

function on_playback_dynamic_info() {}
Dynamic info (VBR bitrate etc) change

function on_playback_dynamic_info_track() {}
Per-track dynamic info (stream track titles etc) change. Happens less often than on_playback_dynamic_info().

function on_playback_new_track(metadb) {}
[1.1.0] Updated: metadb - Refer to IFbMetadbHandle

function on_playback_order_changed(new_order_index) {}
NEW: Called when playback order is changed new_order_index: 0 - "Default" 1 - "Repeat (Playlist)" 2 - "Repeat (Track)" 3 - "Random" 4 - "Shuffle (tracks)" 5 - "Shuffle (albums)" 6 - "Shuffle (folders)

function on_playback_pause(state) {}
state = true when paused, false when resumed

function on_playback_queue_changed(origin) {}
[1.5.0] Added: origin: 0 - changed_user_added 1 - changed_user_removed 2 - changed_playback_advance

function on_playback_seek(time) {}
time - float value, in seconds

function on_playback_starting(cmd, is_paused) {}
cmd: (integer, begin with 0): default, play, next, prev, settrack, rand, resume

function on_playback_stop(reason) {}
reason: (integer, begin with 0): user, eof, starting_another

function on_playlist_item_ensure_visible(playlist, item) {}
[1.5.0 Preview 7] New:

function on_playlist_items_removed(playlist, new_count) {}
[1.4.1] Added: playlist: index to indicate that which playlist has items removed new_count: new items count of the playlist.

function on_playlist_items_reordered(playlist) {}
[1.5.0 Preview] Added: Note this callback is different from on_playlists_changed(), which is applied to playlists, whenever this applied to playlist items instead.
function on_playlist_items_selection_change() {}

function on_playlist_switch() {}
[1.3.0] New:

function on_refresh_background_done() {}
[1.1.10] New: NOTE 1: Always call window.GetBackgroundImage() during this callback NOTE 2: DO NOT call window.Repaint()

function on_selection_changed(metadb) {}
[1.3.2] New: [1.4.0 Beta 1] Changed: This behavior will be changed when "Display->Selection viewers" of foobar2000 preferences is changed. NOTE: metadb may be null. NOTE: metadb will be not valid while preprocessor: "feature" is "v1.4" or newer. (See Preprocessors.txt)
function on_timer(timer_id) {}

function on_tooltip_custom_paint(gr) {}
[1.5.0 Preview 8] New: gr - Refer to IGdiGraphics, note that gr will be invalid out of this callback scope. Please check your "tooltip" preprocessor directive before use.

function on_volume_change(val) {}
val - volume level in dB; 0 for full volume.
